IntellisenseObjectInfo.Name: PivotGridDataSource
IntellisenseObjectInfo.Description: An object that provides access to data for the dxPivotGrid widget.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: fields
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: An array of pivot grid fields.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowCrossGroupCalculation
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether to allow the predefined summary post-processing functions ('absoluteVariation' and 'percentVariation') and runningTotal to take values of different groups into account.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowExpandAll
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Allows an end-user to expand/collapse all header items within a header level.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowFiltering
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Allows an end-user to change filtering options.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowSorting
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Allows an end-user to change sorting options.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: allowSortingBySummary
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Allows an end-user to sort columns by summary values.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: area
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Type of the area where the field is located.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: areaIndex
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Index among the other fields displayed within the same area.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: calculateCustomSummary
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Allows you to use a custom aggregate function to calculate the summary values. Cannot be used for the XmlaStore store type.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: calculateSummaryValue
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a callback function that allows you to modify summary values after they are calculated.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: caption
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A caption that will be displayed in the pivot grid's field chooser to identify the field.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: customizeText
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a callback function that returns the text to be displayed in the cells of a field.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: dataField
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Name of the data source field containing data for the pivot grid field.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: dataType
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a type of field values.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: displayFolder
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: The name of the folder in which the field is located.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: expanded
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Indicates whether all header items of the field's header level are expanded.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: filterType
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: The filter type for the current field.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: filterValues
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: The filter values for the current field.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: format
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a display format for field values.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: groupIndex
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: The index of the field within a group.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: groupInterval
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies how the values of the current field are combined into groups. Cannot be used for the XmlaStore store type.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: groupName
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: The name of the group to which the field belongs.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: isMeasure
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether the field should be treated as a Data Field.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: precision
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies a precision for formatted field values.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: runningTotal
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether to summarize each next summary value with the previous one by rows or columns.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: selector
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the function that determines how to split data from the data source into ranges for header items. Cannot be used for the XmlaStore store type.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: showGrandTotals
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not to display Grand Total values for the field.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: showTotals
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies whether or not to display Total values for the field.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: sortBy
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies how field data should be sorted. Can be used for the XmlaStore store type only.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: sortBySummaryField
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the data field against which the header items of this field should be sorted.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: sortBySummaryPath
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: The array of field names that specify a path to column/row whose summary field is used for sorting of this field's header items.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: sortingMethod
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies how to sort the header items.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: sortOrder
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the initial sort order of field values.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: summaryDisplayMode
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the summary post-processing algorithm.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: summaryType
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies how to aggregate field data. Cannot be used for the XmlaStore store type.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: visible
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A boolean value specifying whether or not the field is visible in the pivot grid and the Field Chooser.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: width
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the absolute width of the field in the pivot grid.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: filter
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies data filtering conditions. Cannot be used for the XmlaStore store type.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onChanged
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the changed event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onFieldsPrepared
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the fieldsPrepared event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onLoadError
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the loadError event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: onLoadingChanged
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: A handler for the loadingChanged event.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: retrieveFields
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Indicates whether or not the automatic field generation from data in the Store is enabled.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: store
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the underlying Store instance used to access data.

IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Name: type
IntellisenseObjectPropertyInfo.Description: Specifies the type of the store used to access data.
